description:
Ma is busy with her big year-end cleaning, so Ashibe and Goma-chan want to help.
Ma asks them to go buy a cucumber, but when Ashibe sees Kanji troubled by the lack of customers, he wants to help him too.
As Ashibe and Goma-chan help the stores, Goma-chan quickly becomes the celebrity of the entire shopping street.
Source: crunchyroll
